TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IValueGeneratorCache

summary.para: Keeps a cache of value generators for properties.
This type is typically used by database providers (and other extensions). It is generally not used in application code.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.ValueGeneration.ValueGenerator GetOrAdd(class Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Metadata.IProperty property, class Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Metadata.IEntityType entityType, class System.Func`3<class Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Metadata.IProperty, class Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Metadata.IEntityType, class Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.ValueGeneration.ValueGenerator> factory) cil managed
Public Function GetOrAdd (property As IProperty, entityType As IEntityType, factory As Func(Of IProperty, IEntityType, ValueGenerator)) As ValueGenerator

Docs.param: The property to get the value generator for.
The entity type that the value generator will be used for. When called on inherited properties on derived entity types, this entity type may be different from the declared entity type on
Factory to create a new value generator if one is not present in the cache.
Docs.summary: Gets the existing value generator from the cache, or creates a new one if one is not present in the cache.
Docs.returns: The existing or newly created value generator.
